titles: Whig upon Whig, or, A pleasant dismal ballad on the old plotters newly found out to the tune of O hone, O hone.
notes: With, on verso: The Whigs laid open, or, An honest ballad of these sad times : to a mery tune, called Old Symon the King. Printed by N.T., 1683.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
